T.text: Do not show this message again.
Save my preference and don't ask again.
Your printer's firmware must be updated before you can continue.
Your printer has been updated. You're ready to go.
All printer, appearance...etc settings are accessed here
Only modify these settings if you're an experienced user
Resets the view to the front \n of the printer
Sends the object \n to the printer
Centers the model within \n the printer
Please cycle power on the printer by disconnecting and then reconnecting it to power.
Returns the view to the object library
For moving the object \n on the floor of the printer
Unable to connect to the print spooler. Please make sure the print spooler has started.
Please clean the nozzle and make sure that the print bed is clear. We wouldn't want any accidents. Be careful. The nozzle can be very hot.
Your printer has been updated. You're ready to go.
Unable to connect to the printer. Try resetting or reconnecting your printer.
Unable to connect to the printer. Try resetting or reconnecting your printer.
Sorry. Please make sure that the 3D printer has been connected.
The Z location of your printer has been lost. Please clear the print bed. \n\nCalibrate bed location now?
Sorry. There is a problem with your factory gantry values. You will not be able to print until you calibrate your printer. \n\nCalibrate gantry now?
Sorry. There is a problem with your factory gantry values. You will not be able to print until you calibrate your printer. \n\nCalibrate gantry now?
Sorry. There seems to be a problem with your Micro-motion chip.

Sorry. Your printer has lost calibration. This can happen if the printer loses power either during a print or soon after a print has completed. You can not safely print with the printer in this state.
Sorry. Something seriously wrong has happened.
Sorry. Your model cannot be printed because it is out of the printable bounds of the printer.
System has been inactive for too long, heater and motors have been turned off
Warning. The firmware on the printer is newer than your current software. Please get the latest M3D Software.
Warning. Large ABS prints may fail. Do you want to continue printing?
The software you are running is using a different version of the M3D Print Spooler interface. You may need to reinstall your software.
Sorry. Can't start new print job because the printer is busy printing something else.
Your printer has invalid backlash values.
Please make sure that your gantry clips have been removed.
A message sent to print spooler was invalid.
Sorry, but single-point calibration is not currently supported on this printer
Sorry, but five-point calibration is not currently supported on this printer
Unable to start saved print because the 3D ink used doesn't match what's currently in the printer.
Sorry. Unable to send command to the printer. Please try again.
Sorry. The printer is being controlled by another process.
Sorry. Unable to send command because the previous command has not yet completed.
Sorry. Unable to send the command because the printer is not in firmware mode.
The command was interrupted by another user or process.
Sorry, but your request failed because the printer was not paused.
Sorry, but your request failed because the printer was not printing.
Sorry, but your request failed because the printer has been paused or is printing
Unable to send command to the printer
There was an error sending data to the printer. Please try again.
Unable to pause the job while it's saving to the printer.
Adds a new filament temperature profile.
Removes an existing filament temperature profile.

Filament Profiles allow you to set the temperature for a particular filament/color combination. This is for advanced users only and we recommend using the default settings that have been tested by M3D. Not doing so can damage your printer.

M3D Software

This software is intended for use with M3D 3D printer models and is licensed in accordance with the agreement displayed at time of installation. This agreement can additionally be accessed at any time via the M3D website "Terms of Use" link.

This software is not open source, but it may use components that are. See the documentation in the program folder for license information on open source products incorporated in this software.

Copyright 2014-2017 M3D LLC


Version:
Warning: These controls should only be used by expert users or with help from M3D technical support.
Warning. Changing these filament profiles can cause damage to your printer and is for advanced users only.
Would you like to make M3D the default program for opening 3D model files?
The collection that you are loading was formatted for the {0}, but you are now loading it on a {1}.\n\nWould you like to load it anyway?
You already have a 3D model loaded. Would you like to replace the current 3D model or use both?
A large scale values has been applied to this model. This model may be corrupted and the print may fail.
Your model is smaller than the initial layer height and may not print correctly. Do you want to try to print it anyway?
Sorry, but a printer has not been connected.
Sorry, but the printer is already printing.
Sorry, but the printer is calibrating.
Sorry. Please load a model before printing.
Sorry. The printer needs to be calibrated.
Sorry. Please load 3D Ink before printing.
Sorry. Your model cannot be printed because it is outside of the printable bounds of the printer.
Your print will begin shortly. Please clean the nozzle and make sure that the print bed is clear to prevent accidents. Be careful. The nozzle may be very hot.
Your model is being prepared. Please wait.
Your print will begin shortly. Please clean the nozzle and make sure that the print bed is clear to prevent accidents. Be careful. The nozzle may be very hot.
Please wait while the model is prepared for the printer.
Running low on filament. \n\nWould you like to purchase more?
Lack of filament may cause print failure. \n\nWould you like to continue printing?
Note: Please make sure nozzle is clean before starting print
A new update has been downloaded.
Allow multiple models to be loaded.
Ask to remove current model when loading a new model.
What to do when a new update is available
The color of the printer in the software
The color of new icons in your model library
An update is available for download.
A new update has been downloaded.
The model was detected to be in inches and was converted to work in this software.
The model was detected to be in microns and was converted to work in this software.
Shows options accessories attached to this printer
